CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper September 25, 1943, pg. unknown, reads: "Joe Johns and His Boxing Troupe Visit Bedridden Soldiers at Veterans Hospital - On his way to Camp Shenango last Monday, Sgt. Joe Louis and his touring troupe of boxers stopped off at the Veteran's hospital in Butler to visit some of the inmates... At the right: Joe Louis and Ray (Sugar) Robinson talk to a Negro soldier who was hurt in England.  At the extreme right is Chaplain Martin of Shenango...  Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Boxers Joe Louis and Sugar Ray Robinson at veteran's bedside with chaplain Martin on right, at Butler Veterans' Hospital
